website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a food-themed playset. While similar sets often have poorly made components, this one stands out for quality and design.
pros: Provides all the necessities to fill play kitchens with a variety of realistic looking food items
30 pieces garner praise for their durable plastic craftsmanship and sharp details
cons: Some of the pieces aren't true to size compared to real food, but this is a minor concern that most kids won't mind
A few small parts – not for kids under 3

customer_reviews.title: The BEST play food!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST set of play food that we have found! Excellent quality and a perfect size for small hands. Very realistic looking food (fruit, meat, desserts, vegetables, etc). I have shown the play food next to a can, to show the approximate size. I highly recommend this product. Please mark if you find my review helpful. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Wishing I could give it more stars!
customer_reviews.text: Wishing I could give it more stars! I read other reviewers speak of the quality and wondered, “what’s so great about toy food?” Seriously, I’ll never buy another brand! This is much more sturdy than other play food. Firm and resilient enough that I don’t have to worry about my toddler crushing or breaking it, and soft enough that I don’t worry about him scratching his baby sister with it! We talk about what the food items are called, their colors, count them, and practice sharing. I can wait to buy the other sets! I’m so glad I stumbled across such an awesome find
customer_reviews.author: Fairest1ofall

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This food is legit! Nicest quality play food I’ve come across! Love that it came with a grocery basket and a faux wicker/farm basket. Kids loved it and my 3 year old knew exactly what everything was except the Ice cream sandwich because we are negligent parents and he’s lived 3 years never having had an ice cream sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: soonersonia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality like everyone else says. The rubber toys have weight to them and are not cheap plastic. The sandwich bread is even spongey! So fun! Truly worth the money. Bought this because she fell in love with the food set at the gym kids club and this is the same one. Photo shows the sandwich even I had fun making LOL
customer_reviews.author: Mango Mood

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great addition to toy box
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old loves these. They aren't too big or too small for her. They aren't made of the cheap plastic, so I don't have to worry about them cracking or pieces breaking off. There was no strange odor and so far none of the coloring has come off or faded. The baskets are also durable and my baby loves taking the food out and putting them back in the baskets. Great toy for teaching your little one names for fruits and vegetables. Some are harder than others, so my baby liked chewing on certain ones at different stages of teething. (I just keep an eye on her when she has the cookie or pretzels)
customer_reviews.author: Crista C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ... except no banana
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best play food set I've had/seen. Besides my own children/grandchildren, I've worked in schools, play therapy centers, hospitals, crisis centers, etc that cater to children . None of the play food I've ever seen can compare to the durability or detail. Really like the size and variety of the foods ... except no banana. The shopping basket and farmer's market basket are adorable. My recommendation for play food ... Manufacturers, please add a banana. It is the one fruit all children recognize.
customer_reviews.author: stillwaters

customer_reviews.title: 9 month old LOVES these.
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! My 9 month old baby immediately recognized several of the food items and particularly likes pretending to eat the milkshake and the cookie, probably because she's seen me eat them. She even makes slurping sounds with the milkshake, it's adorable. She's the kind of baby who thinks screaming like a banshee feels amazing and I swear her life has a constant death metal soundtrack playing in the background, but when she was given her food toys, she was silent as she played with them for at least an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Sinmara Jotunn

customer_reviews.title: Favorite two year old toy
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a whim for my sons birthday. He turned two. He LOVES them. He now loves to "cook" and make us meals. He uses words to name them. (Although in real life there is a slim chance to him actually eating some of this food-one can hope that might get better!). Some of the food pieces are solid and some have little air holes. I prefer the solid ones since he still puts everything in his mouth, but it's not a deal breaker. The reality is that this is the number one played with from his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Ceebee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I've seen lots pf play food, but assumed that it's all made of that flimsy cheap plastic that crack easily and looks all shiny and fake. The reviews on this set were really good though, so I figured I'd give it a shot and am blown away. Each piece is not only fairly realistic looking, but they have a nice weight to them and are made of a great rubbery material that is obviously sturdy. My only regret is not buying the bigger set that has 3 baskets with breakfast, lunch, and dinner! Had I known how great the quality was, I would totally have splurged.
customer_reviews.author: olgavrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality play food you can buy. It looks realistic, fits perfectly in the Melissa and Doug pots and it’s firm and doesn’t seem like it’s going to fall apart. I’m glad I listened to the other reviews and paid a little extra for good these quality toys. The only negative I could come up with is that I wanted a set of all the food they make but you would have to buy multiple sets and end up with double items. Other than that this play food is excellent and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and seem to be good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My son has only been using this set for a week, so I can’t speak to their durability over time yet. But these seem to be of very good quality. They’re soft (so aren’t too dangerous if thrown “accidentally” at baby sister) but feel sturdy. Just the right amount of variety for a 2.5 year old (I think he’d just be overwhelmed by a giant set of play food right now). So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I would expect more. Some of the pieces are nicely made, such as the bread. Other pieces are not. The pear is not much more than a rough shape and is strangely thinner than the other pieces. If you came across these in a pile, you may think they came from multiple sets. While it's a perfectly adequate toy, I wouldn't buy it as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best play food set around for my money
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 2-year-old grandson and has been a huge hit. He will be 3 in a month and still plays with it frequently as does his 15 month old sister now. The pieces are fairly realistic. In fact, my granddaughter was very confused and disappointed that the ice cream sandwich was too hard to eat! Even the baskets get used. I think this is the best 'starter' set as it has a bit of everything and 2 baskets. Very happy with this brand. Will be buying more from them. I don't often give glowing reviews, but this one surprised me in a good way.
customer_reviews.author: wacry

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of food for my son to play with
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of food for my son to play with. Many of the play food available looked cheap or didn’t have a wide variety. This has a good mix of fruits, veggies and other foods. My 14mo old loves to put them in and pull them out of the baskets that came with the food. Will be great for pretend play as he gets older and goes well with his toddler kitchen. The pretzels that came in the pack are a bit small for my son who still puts everything in his mouth and could choke so I put those away until he gets a bit older. Otherwise great size on the other food that is included.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Panda

customer_reviews.title: Great play food
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my son some play food so he left my fridge alone. This was perfect, he loves the snack and going over the fruits and veggies. Even more so he loves dumping the bucket of food into the basket! I as a mom of a crazy toddler boy loved how soft the food was and loved the basket to carry as well because it's sooo cute! Great product, reasonable price for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: olivia carril

customer_reviews.title: Great set, good price, quality play food!
customer_reviews.text: Ive been looking for play food for a while and I am very happy I found this set. Some reviews say that the pieces are small but the box says specifically designed for small hands. I think the orange looks more like a clementine which doesnt bother me and the pretzels are small but again, no big deal. Im glad the set is not all fruits and vegetables and provides variety. The plastic is very durable and not thin. I also like the lack of canned or cardboard food items. Very happy with this set, the price, and the baskets provided are also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Skelly

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best toy food on the market! Not all of the sizing is “real life” but all of it is durable and cute. Nothing about this brand is cheap to me. We’ve had this food for 2 months now and even with two teething children chewing on them and wreaking havoc, there’s been no damage done or any color/design worn off them. I’m going to be loyal to the brand because of my experience!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good quality and realistic
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good quality and realistic. So much so that the younger kiddos are confused and trying to eat pieces and I got upset that someone left a clementine in the playroom, nope, just awesome quality pretend food set! I didn’t want to spend extra on this set, but glad I did instead of one of those cheapo sets where the food is crushed if you accidentally step on it. This will last heavy play and multiple kids 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great pretend food!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of this food. Each item looks like it should. (The pretzels do look a little bit We've only played with the fruits and veggies so far. My son (almost 2 years old), is able to pick out the items easily. I had to put the cucumber and lemon away as he was constantly putting them in his mouth. (I blame this on teething and not the toy.) There was no chemical smell. The market basket and farmer's basket are both really cute. I'm looking forward to seeing what things my son will cook for me!
customer_reviews.author: ACE of Burke's

customer_reviews.title: Great Learning Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Each item is so well done, from small details such as the salt on the pretzels to the realistic textures in the slice of bread. My toddler is a meticulous organizer so having the shopping basket as well as the bushel basket was an important factor in my decision to purchase this set. The sandwich is the best, with individual toppings: bread slices, salami slice, lettuce, tomato, and the most realistic slice of cheese I've ever seen. It might actually be too realistic, like a slice of processed yellow cheese that sat out of its wrapper for a day or two. It's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: SND

customer_reviews.title: Pricier than others, but SO worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, but worth the extra money! I’ve never purchased such great quality and realistic looking play food for my daughters until I splurged and got them these. I am so happy I did! I went crazy looking up all of the toys sold by this brand to put on our wish lists for Christmas! Absolutely wonderful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Livingston

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality play food that I have found. The pieces are strong feeling and very durable. I love that they don't feel cheap and the colors are awesome. I HIGHLY recommend this to any toddlers and kids looking for fun play food to add to their playsets!
customer_reviews.author: Marlina

customer_reviews.title: I looked at every single play food set available before ...
customer_reviews.text: I looked at every single play food set available before purchasing these. I would give them 10 stars if I could. They are much higher quality than any of the other plastic sets I've seen, and more realistic than the wooden sets. Each piece has a different texture. The colors are vibrant, and they've held up perfectly to 3 months of regular play and a few trips through the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps toddler busy
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old loves her food toys! We are learning different fruits vegetables and snacks. She’s teething and chews on the carrot & asparagus and I haven’t noticed any bite marks or pieces bitten off. Some of the food is light and “hollow” and other pieces are pretty solid. Regardless she loves it and I’m so glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, nice, detailing, good spread of fruits/veggies/meats/snacks. my 2 year old plays with them daily and uses the basket and barrel as well. It's not too many pieces, some sets are so large, they are hard to keep in tact, and others don't offer enough variety. This is the perfect set!
customer_reviews.author: DesignChick01

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: I was even more pleased than I expected with this play food set. Most of the pieces are rubberized, so they are soft (we know how toddlers love to throw) and they are vibrant in color and just plain cute. The baskets are adorable and hold everything between the 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality and quantity for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and quantity for the price. I bought this to go with my daughters Melissa & Doug® Fresh Mart Grocery Store Set. She loves making and selling the food. Might have to buy another one for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cantamama

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set and it made my grandson very happy. The quality is good and seems like it will last awhile. It’s true that the food isn’t exactly to scale, but it didn’t matter to him. I didn’t notice any offensive smell. The basket containers are handy for storage. No parts were missing. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Thorn

customer_reviews.title: The quality is amazing, I don't think I'll buy any other pretend ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with a few other Learning Resource play food sets as birthday presents for my daughter's 2nd birthday. You can't go wrong with Learning Resource products. The quality is amazing, I don't think I'll buy any other pretend food sets from any other company! I already have an Amazon list just for my daughter and it is packed with Learning Resource products.
customer_reviews.author: Selah Elise

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, withstands teething
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this set. There's a nice variety of healthy foods. They have a nice, soft rubbery feel and have stood up to months of toddler teething with only a few marks to show for it. I did take away the cookie when the brown paint of the chocolate chips started coming off, but I blame that on how often my daughter put it in her mouth rather the the toy. I will be purchasing more of this New Sprouts line in the future to expand her kitchen collection!
customer_reviews.author: Joy T.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT play food set!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for our 1 year old’s play kitchen and it’s PERFECT! Just the right size of pieces and we loves the sturdy texture. The basket is super durable and has nice cushioned handles. We will order more sets from learning resources!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! My son loves these and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! My son loves these and they are the perfect type of material. Some food toys out there are wooden which chip when teething, and some are cheap plastic that looks and feels like it would fall apart and might even be poisonous. These are a harder type of rubber that look and feel like they will last!
customer_reviews.author: BD Colo

customer_reviews.title: The best food toys
customer_reviews.text: Everything Learning Resources makes is such good quality. Had wooden food toys and they were hard to clean and the paint wore off in places from cleaning. Replaced everything with this brand and so much happier. Easy to clean, nice colors and amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Calderin

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 1yr old and they’re so cute! The texture is soft and bendable. Only problem is that they’re scattered all over the place. Our daughter was also mad when she tried to bite the ice cream sandwich and realized it was not real.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Q.

customer_reviews.title: Safe, fun and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 1 yr old granddaughter’s kitchen. These items are durable and perfect for Little ones. Lots of fun “food” that’s safe , colorful and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Play Food!
customer_reviews.text: Learning Resources food is our preferred brand. The pieces are realistic and durable. They're also easy to keep clean. This set has a little bit of everything. I purchased it to go along with my daughter's new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hinkle-Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Happy mom
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and so does my two year old! Of all the food items that came there are only a couple I think are strange- like the juice box- but it really is perfect for play time.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This food set is a real quality product. I originally was looking into getting one of those big sets with tons of food and dishes, but the reviews repeatedly mentioned poor quality. On the other hand, this Learning Resources set has great detail and quality. It turned out the be the perfect amount of food to go with a kitchen set we purchased for our toddler. He loves the little basket and bin that came with the set. Very pleased that we went this route.
customer_reviews.author: Maury Al

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely great buy! The quality of the food is fantastic and very durable. There are no sharp edges either. I've owned other play foods and these far surpass them. I was a bit nervous spending this much on play food online, but the reviews didnt let me down. You definitely get what you pay for. I will be ordering the other sets. These toys are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Best play food we own
customer_reviews.text: This is the best play food my daughter has. It's made really well and she always gravitates towards this product over anything else she has and she has a ton of play kitchen stuff. The two baskets are cute too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Fun Toy Food Set
customer_reviews.text: My one year old granddaughter knew immediately that these plastic toys symbolize food, and she loves chewing on them. The plastic is quite thick and sturdy and each food item is realistic and appropriately textured. This is a very educational toy since we can name each of the food items and ask her to bring them to us or put them in the baskets. She also received a grocery cart for Christmas, and it happens to be a great place to store all of the food pieces. This fun toy set has great play value and we expect to use for several years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clardy

customer_reviews.title: High quality plastic, great size for a younger age group.
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a toy kitchen for our 21 month old for Christmas. I wanted to find some play food that would be sturdy, but still fit for her age. These are seriously the best for a younger age. I did a lot of research from plastic to wooden and decided on these. The wood is cute, but I wanted something not as hard for her age. The plastic is high quality, great color, very realistic and overall just a great product! Definitely recommend for a younger age group!
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old loves them!! He was soo excited in fact even my 10 year old dropped her video game to come and play since the food looked so life like
customer_reviews.author: sarah gross

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line Play Food
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, you can't beat New Sprouts play food. The quality and attention to detail is far better than any other play food that I've seen. I will never again have to look at a piece of play food and wonder, "Is that a tomato? Maybe a strawberry? Or some very small pizza?" All of the pieces are very realistic looking, but at a slightly smaller size for little hands. This is the only type of play food I will ever buy again!
customer_reviews.author: A Feen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t opened it yet. It’s for my 2 year old granddaughter Oakley’s Birthday! Her parents got her a new kitchen with stove, refrigerator, sink dishes, and I don’t know what else, but my daughter thought this would go with it good!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Take the pretzels away
customer_reviews.text: This set is very well made. It doesn’t indent or squish like cheaper brands. The detail is very realistic (except for the pretzel- it looks like dog poop with worms) and my daughter loves this set. I’m giving it 4 stars because my 2 year old can fit the entire pretzel in her mouth. Choking hazard.
customer_reviews.author: nkent1981

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. The strawberry was oddly big but like the variety of fruits and vegetables, it had. Can spend hours talking about different things while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Parker

customer_reviews.title: Value, quality and size
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and I love the pretend food. They are perfectly sized and it gives toddlers food and name recognition
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Danley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids LOVE pretend foods. This is a good set with a lot of variety. There are two baskets to sort the toys.
customer_reviews.author: MomX5

customer_reviews.title: Best play food ever.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this play food! It’s well made, looks lifelike, and provides hours of endless entertainment! Absolutely worth the price, better quality than any other play food I’ve ever seen. Will be buying more of it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: These foods are nice! A bit smaller than I anticipated, but perfect size for my 2yo. The plastic is thicker & sort of more rubbery than other, cheaper products; seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great set!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best playfood we've ever had. I have four kids and we've had all kinds of playfood - from hand-made crocheted, to felt, to plastic, to wood. These are substantial, look like real food, and are not commercialized or pre-packaged products. It's a very nice set - and my daughter was thrilled when she opened her gift. Can't recommend it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Best play food out there
customer_reviews.text: We've had this set for a few months now. It has held up very well. I love that the pieces aren't that thin hard plastic that breaks the second you step on it. Most items are a soft, flexible plastic. My almost 2 year old daughter loves her food and plays with it daily. I love the basket and bushel it comes with so everything can be stored nicely. It contains a very nice variety of foods - lots of fruits and vegetables, snacks, drink, main entrées, and sweets.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Very strong smell
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, but some of these toys smell so strongly of chemicals that they give me a headache (about half of the items). I tried to wash them but don't feel comfortable giving them to my child as is. I am hoping that another washing and airing them out over time will help eliminate some of the chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Marlana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review after a year of use, and the toys still look like we just took them out of the package! We have four kids, and have also had several foster kiddos in and out who have played with this set. They are extremely durable and great quality. In fact we’re ordering other toys of this brand for Christmas this year because we’re so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: MISSING FOOD VERY DISAPPOINTING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good item my kids love it but it is very anoying to me that im missing the raspberrys and the cucumber only got 2 pretzels super disappointing
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this set and the quality and durability are adequate for our needs. Satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Straight to the point

customer_reviews.title: Great way to learn with food
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. She calls them her vegetables. She uses them to count, learn colors, and for learning names of food. She loves making a sandwich and pretending to eat the items. They are flexible, so you don’t have to worry much about the little one getting hurt while playing.
customer_reviews.author: EZShopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wish I bought this set first instead of wasting my money on the magnetic wooden sets. Great quality & safe for babies. My 4 & 1yo love them.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: high quality, durable, and fun
customer_reviews.text: These are just the best in terms of fake food brands. They appear to be made for classrooms, which means they hold up well to abuse from kids. They are also a good way to teach healthy food habits. My children love them, and this set is a good value for the money and a good variety.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M.

customer_reviews.title: I am freaking out over these!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the truth. I'm more excited over how these look and feel more than the kids but that's because I know that they will last longer and the look so fantastic!! I won't buy any other brand and I instead to buy more! Thank you for making these!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Barker Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! One of the most realistic play food toys I've seen yet. Ny daughter loves this set. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I wanted some play food to go with my daughter's play kitchen she received for her birthday. these are really sturdy and not cheap thin plastic like other brands. These will hold up for years of play. She loves to carry around the basket. Will definitely be checking out other products.
customer_reviews.author: HSheff

customer_reviews.title: This food looks so real!
customer_reviews.text: Each food item was a very thick plastic. Realistic looking. You get a lot of food items in this set. And some different kinds of things like a cinnamon roll, ice cream sandwich, pretzels, steak, etc. the baskets are very sturdy and hold all the food items. Was extremely pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Usually toys are plastic and easily broken well these are not! Very durable for a toddler! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Hatch

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves this. I did not think he would be this interested in this set, but he loves making little sandwiches and pretending to eat food.
customer_reviews.author: JJSR

customer_reviews.title: The food does not feel like cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it! The food does not feel like cheap plastic. It’s sturdy and durable. I think it will hold up really well to even the roughest of playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I had been searching for some pretend toys for my 18 month and four year olds kitchen set. The stuff was either very cheap and plastic or hard wood (neither of which I liked). This set was perfect for both of my daughters and their ages! The material is great and the selection of items they chose is great for my 18 year old to learn!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S.

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite food items
customer_reviews.text: My niece adores her food play set and so does her little dog. Will purchase again. Great quality, excellent detail, great for learning and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolates De Laura

customer_reviews.title: High quality toy
customer_reviews.text: High quality toy. The plastic is a great texture and everything seems very durable
customer_reviews.author: S&J

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, good quality.my one and half year boy learning these , four star only because of its high price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and very accurate in terms of size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toys, of very high quality. Only a few of them were thin plastic... have no idea why the cucumber was that way. I love this variety too. My daughter has a ton of fun making a sandwich with full condiments (she's 5)
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for imaginative play for kids. A bit pricey for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Indypenny

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great gift for my grandchildren play kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful playlet! It comes with storage, very realistic food, perfect size! Love it! I highly recommend it! My LO loves and play hours and hours!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando U. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 month old son loves this set! He plays with it daily! He he often chews on the pieces because he is teething and there are no teeth marks!
customer_reviews.author: renay staley

customer_reviews.title: NOT the cheapy fake plastic food!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality play food. It's not that hollow junky thin plastic food that is so common. This play food set has so much too- great for multiple kids! I bought this for a retail store (kids play area), and have gotten so many compliments on this food.
customer_reviews.author: Kimchi from sd

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Great play set. I love the texture & durability of the items. There's a nice selection of food provided. Highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole4383

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome! It comes with a fun variety of foods. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My kids love them. They’re good quality and as “real” looking as kids toys will get
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old son loves it! Hours of play!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves to "cook" and these food toys are a perfect addition to his grill/kitchen. The foods are easy to identify - they look like the real thing. Also they feel more like a soft (a tiny bit of a squishy feel??) plastic rather than thin, cheap plastic foods you sometimes find that crush or dent.
customer_reviews.author: Kel92_

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality play food.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 year old and am very pleased. The baskets and food all seem very solid and well-made with high-quality materials. He of course chews on them but they are big enough that I don't worry about him choking. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CRR&3

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this for his kitchen! It’s not that cheap hollowed out plastic like most toy food. It’s more heavy duty and silicone feeling!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Fun Food Set!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for your little one! We went all out on the kitchen theme for my little one this past Christmas: play kitchen, tea set, grocery buggy, and play food. It has been two months, and she still plays with this food everyday. And it has to be the most durable play food I have ever seen...she really sinks her teeth into it! And very piece is still going strong. Other sets she crushed in two days. I have recommended this to ALL my mom friends. And it has a great assortment of food for learning food names for younger ones and encouraging healthy eating habits for all!
customer_reviews.author: MaconMaMa

customer_reviews.title: I sent this to my niece in Alaska for christmas
customer_reviews.text: I know my niece is going to LOVE this toy, my two children have many other Learning Resource toys and she loves pretending to "cook". The toys are toddler/preschooler size and made of a durable rubber and the colors haven't faded on any of the sets we have. The sizes aren't accurate however, entirely that is some things are smaller or much larger than their counter parts. However they are a hit with both boys and girls!
customer_reviews.author: S morales

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 18 month old favorite new toys. She loves "making dinner" for everyone. We bought some used melamine saucers and she plays and plays.
customer_reviews.author: Cay T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality realistic
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality. Its not a hard plastic. More a softer flexible material. Its very nice and realistic i would buy more definitely
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: By far the best play food I have found for my daughter. I was extremely impressed with the quality of these items!
customer_reviews.author: kasey

customer_reviews.title: missing three pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. My child loves playing with them but I noticed it supposed to be 32 pieces and we received only 29! missing the cookie, a pretzel and ice cream sandwich. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I have 2 year old twins who are pretty rough. They are still teething
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 year old twins who are pretty rough. They are still teething, too. This is worth the extra cost. After 2 months of daily play I'm still comfortable letting them play with everything. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: happymomoftwins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by the sturdiness of this play food! It’s very well made and there is a good variety of food times, including some less common ones like Asparagus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son enjoys playing with the toys but be careful.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old enjoys playing with these toys. I just wanted to write this review / note to let parents know some of the paint comes off. My son was biting on the chocolate chip cookie and the black paint was coming off on the chips. Again, just wanted to make other parents aware.
customer_reviews.author: David Tamashiro

customer_reviews.title: The best quality play food I've ever seen!
customer_reviews.text: This play food is such high quality! Everything is great, solid, realistic, and the baskets are really enjoyed by my kids. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyFaye

customer_reviews.title: High Recommend
customer_reviews.text: High Quality. The items are so cute and thick. They wont crush if you step on them, trust me I know!!! Great item
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Solidly good play food. Very good variety, and the baskets are a hit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter loves all the neat pretend foods.
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves all the neat pretend foods. The food items look real and makes for a lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Debra Rooks

customer_reviews.title: Great playtime food!!
customer_reviews.text: Very realistic food. The kids love the variety!! Very fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love learning new sprouts! Very durable toys that you know are going to last a long time and it is so cute and realistic!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I teach 4 year olds. I had some styrofoam fruits and veggies that (so many 4 year olds playing) were ruined. These are natural looking and sturdy. My kids are having so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I was more than happy to spend a little more money on better quality ...
customer_reviews.text: After seeing cheaper food sets, I was more than happy to spend a little more money on better quality and Learning Resources fit the bill! These pieces have held up to my 2 yr old playing, biting and sucking on. My only complaint is I wish the bushel basket was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: JerzyTomato

product_meta.title: Learning Resources New Sprouts Deluxe Market Set, Play Food, Grocery Play Toy, 32 Piece Set, Ages 2+
product_meta.description:
Shop the farmers market. Encourage imaginative play, healthy-eating choices and basic vocabulary development with this set of 30 different types of freshly designed produce. Made of soft, durable plastic, perfect for curious little sprouts. High-quality, realistically detailed pieces include: 1 bushel basket, 1 shopping basket, apple, pear, lemon, strawberry, grapes, asparagus, corn, carrot, cucumber, broccoli, juice box, orange, potato, yogurt, 2 slices of bread, cinnamon roll, 3 pretzels, 2 slices of cheese, salami, cookie, 2 lettuce leaves, tomato slice, ice cream sandwich, steak, and a hot dog.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Shop the farmers market. Encourage imaginative play, healthy-eating choices and basic vocabulary development with this set of 30 different types of freshly designed produce. Made of soft, durable plastic, perfect for curious little sprouts. Includes one shopping basket and one bushel basket. Toddlers (Ages 2+). Set of 32.
feature_bullets: HANDS ON EXPERIENCE: Children can create composite shapes, identify shape attributes, and partition circles and squares into equal parts
ROLE PLAY: Invite early dramatic role play, build vocabulary, and model mealtime routines with the most familiar foods to toddlers
32 PIECES: Includes one shopping basket, one bushel basket and 30 food items made of soft, crush-resistant plastic

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
